comments: Note that a(2,3,4,5)={1,4,13,121} coincide with A003462(1,2,3,5). - _Zak Seidov_, Dec 19 2014
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..90
formula: a(n) = a(n-1) + 3^(n-2) a(n-2).Associated constant: C_3=lim n-->infty a(n)*a(n-2)/a(n-1)^2 =1.147262608254535257774121586.... - _Benoit Cloitre_, Aug 30 2003
mathematica: RecurrenceTable[{a[0]==0, a[1]==1, a[n]==a[n-1]+a[n-2]*3^(n-2)}, a, {n, 30}] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 08 2012 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [0] cat[n le 2 select 1 else Self(n-1) + Self(n-2)*(3^(n-2)): n in [1..20]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 08 2012
